name: Clean the Mess
description:
Clean the Mass v.1.0.0

This is a Planar Graph puzzle game that's been so addictive with cute game graphics. Game is saved automatically at the end of the every level of the game. Good luck with cleaning the mess.

  • You can play this game with only mouse.

What will be in the next version?

  • 15 new level
  •  New graphics
  •  Options to control the game elements like music
